text: allāhanalli hāgū antima dinadalli viśvāsaviḍada mattu allāh mattavana dūtaru niṣēdhisiruvudannu niṣid'dhavendu parigaṇisadavara virud'dha hāgū granthanīḍalpaṭṭavara paiki, satya dharmavannu svīkarisadavara virud'dha yud'dha sāriri – avaru tam'ma kaiyinda ‘jijhiyā’ (daṇḍa) pāvatisi, adhīnarāgi biḍuva tanaka
